rule: If the chatbot is unable to process or determine the part of speech for the provided word, the output must be "CantAnswer", written exactly as shown and must not include any additional characters, spaces, or punctuation.
input: sentence: My favorite color is orangeish., word: orangeish
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single word, "Unknown". According to the description, "Unknown" is a valid response when the word cannot be tagged with the listed tags. The description does not put any restriction on returning "Unknown", therefore the output complies with the description.
OK
